property.description: Enable services rest api on ResourceManager.
property.name: yarn.webapp.api-service.enable
yarn.nodemanager.container-executor.class
property.description: This is the container executor setting that ensures that all applications are started with the LinuxContainerExecutor.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.linux-container-executor.group
property.description: The POSIX group of the NodeManager. It should match the setting in "container-executor.cfg". This configuration is required for validating the secure access of the container-executor binary.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.linux-container-executor.nonsecure-mode.limit-users
property.description: Whether all applications should be run as the NodeManager process' owner. When false, applications are launched instead as the application owner.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.runtime.linux.allowed-runtimes
property.description: Comma separated list of runtimes that are allowed when using LinuxContainerExecutor. The allowed values are default, docker, and javasandbox.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.runtime.linux.docker.allowed-container-networks
property.description: Optional. A comma-separated set of networks allowed when launching containers. Valid values are determined by Docker networks available from `docker network ls`

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.runtime.linux.docker.default-container-network
property.description: The network used when launching Docker containers when no network is specified in the request. This network must be one of the (configurable) set of allowed container networks.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.runtime.linux.docker.host-pid-namespace.allowed
property.description: Optional. Whether containers are allowed to use the host PID namespace.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.runtime.linux.docker.privileged-containers.allowed
property.description: Optional. Whether applications are allowed to run in privileged containers.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.runtime.linux.docker.privileged-containers.acl
property.description: Optional. A comma-separated list of users who are allowed to request privileged contains if privileged containers are allowed.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.runtime.linux.docker.capabilities
property.description: Optional. This configuration setting determines the capabilities assigned to docker containers when they are launched. While these may not be case-sensitive from a docker perspective, it is best to keep these uppercase. To run without any capabilites, set this value to "none" or "NONE"
